nodes.title: Resources not closed properly in PropertiesFile
Ack, formatting error fixed and onBlockBreak is now called when a block is destroyed in one hit
Added a hook called onBlockBreak which works more directly than onBlockDestroy + blockStatus == 3
Portal hook and llamafixes(TNT Nerf, lava nerf, bucket fix)
Added some functionality to spawnmob and catching some exceptions
Changed how Time is handled. (+Previous commit)
Fix for block status in onBlockDestroyed
Fixed mob spawning and the grass, which Meaglin did too at the same time
Fixed mob spawning and some little bugs
Wolf spawning and class name update. (Thanks MCP)
Fix for block broken status not being sent
Quickfix for players being able to issue server commands
Started the work to get tempban command working
fix for ClassCastException when placing signs
Yeah, this needs to be pulled asap
Fix for giving kits to other players.
Fixed the concurrentModificationException that was crashing a lot of servers
A proper fix for Player equals()
Fixes Incorrect Amount on the ITEM_PICK_UP Hook Callback
Fixes animal and mob natural spawns
The Ignite hook now covers destruction by fire
Added the cooldown command to Player
An onBurn hook for fire that gets called when fire destroys a block
Users without "ignore restrictions" can't spawn items.
Created class ServerConsoleCommands, to deal with calls to server commands
Admins unable to dig in spawn.
Add requiredplugins to ensure certain plugins always load
Fixed some changes with the item enumeration
Modified the Server.addToServerQueue to use a j.u.concurrent.DelayQueue
Small fix for Inventory; items were wrongly sent to Equipment storage by default
Chest and Furnace inheriting new class, BaseContainerBlock
Adjustments to ItemArray and its subclasses
Refactoring: Superclass ItemContainerBlock for Furnaces and Chests
As per grums request & formatted correctly.
Task now can be executed in the server thread with a given delay.
Classpather - output the classpath to the log to aid in debugging
Store a SHA1 hash of the minecraft_server.jar and check on startup
Patch to avoid null pointer exception from destroying vehicles
Adds Cactus Damage to onDamage and improves Error Handling in PluginLoader.callHook
Added Cactus Damage Hook and Cactus Damage type to the new onDamage. I had to add class as (BlockCactus) to hmod
Control of auto-heal, independent of monsters-spawn
Expansion to the custom hook system (multiple listeners per hook)
Make it clear which builds are from git
Event queue for processing of Runnables
Update to Server class, setBlockAt thread-safe
Update for onFlow and fix for canBuild() and onComplexblockchange
